Verses: 1 boomikkuriya Koodaaramaagiya Nammudaiya Veedu Azhindhuponaalum, Devanaal Kattappatta Kaivelaiyallaadha Niththiya Veedu Paralogaththile Namakku Undendru Arindhirukkirom.
2 enenil, Indhak Koodaaraththile Naam Thaviththu, Nammudaiya Parama Vaasasthalaththaith Thariththukkolla Migavum Vaanjaiyullavargalaayirukkirom;
3 thariththukkondavargalaanaal, Nirvaanigalaaik Kaanappadamaattom.

4 indhak Koodaaraththilirukkira Naam Paaransumandhu Thavikkirom; Indhap Porvaiyaik Kalaindhupodavendumendru Virumbaamal, Maranamaanadhu Jeevanaale Vizhungappaduvadharkaagap Porvai Thariththavargalaayirukkavendumendru Virumbugirom.
5 idharku Nammai Aayaththappaduththugiravar Devane; Aaviyennum Achchaaraththai Namakkuth Thandhavarum Avare.
6 naam Tharisiththu Nadavaamal, Visuvaasiththu Nadakkirom.
7 indhath Dhegaththil Kudiyirukkaiyil Karththaridaththilkudiyiraadhavargalaayirukkiromendru Arindhum, Eppozhudhum Thairiyamaayirukkirom.
8 naam Thairiyamaagaveyirundhu, Indhathdhegaththai Vittuk Kudipogavum Karththaridaththilkudiyirukkavum Adhigamaai Virumbugirom.
9 adhinimiththame Naam Sareeraththil Kudiyirundhaalum Kudiyiraamarponaalum Avarukkup Piriyamaanavargalaayirukka Naadugirom.
10 enendraal, Sareeraththil Avanavan Seydha Nanmaikkaavadhu Theemaikkaavadhu Thakka Balanai Adaiyumpadikku, Naamellaarum Kiristhuvin Niyaayaasanaththirku Munbaaga Velippadavendum.

11 aagaiyaal, Karththarukku Bayappadaththakkadhendru Arindhu, Manusharukkup Puththisollugirom; Dhevanukku Munbaaga Veliyarangamaayirukkirom; Ungal Manasaatchikkum Veliyarangamaayirukkirom Endru Nambugiren.

12 idhanaale Naangal Ungalukku Munbaaga Engalai Marupadiyum Mechchikkollaamal, Irudhayaththilalla, Veliveshaththil Menmaipaaraattugiravargalukku Edhire Engalaik Kuriththu Neengal Menmaipaaraattumpadikku Edhuvundaakkugirom.
13 naangal Paiththiyangondavargalendraal Dhevanukkaaga Appadiyirukkum; Thelindhapuththiyullavargalendraal Ungalukkaaga Appadiyirukkum.
14 kiristhuvinudaiya Anbu Engalai Nerukki Evugiradhu; Enendraal, Ellaarukkaagavum Oruvare Mariththirukka, Ellaarum Mariththaargal Endrum;
15 pizhaiththirukkiravargal Inith Thangalukkendru Pizhaiththiraamal, Thangalukkaaga Mariththu Ezhundhavarukkendru Pizhaiththirukkumpadi, Avar Ellaarukkaagavum Mariththaarendrum Nidhaanikkirom.
16 aagaiyaal, Idhumudharkondu, Naangal Oruvanaiyum Maamsaththinpadi Ariyom; Naangal Kiristhuvaiyum Maamsaththinpadi Arindhirundhaalum, Ini Orupodhum Avarai Maamsaththinpadi Ariyom.
17 ippadiyirukka, Oruvan Kiristhuvukkullirundhaal Pudhusirushtiyaayirukkiraan; Pazhaiyavaigal Ozhindhupoyina, Ellaam Pudhidhaayina.
18 ivaiyellaam Dhevanaale Undaayirukkiradhu; Avar Yesukiristhuvaikkondu Nammaith Thammode Oppuravaakki, Oppuravaakkudhalin Oozhiyaththai Engalukku Oppukkoduththaar.
19 adhennavenil, Dhevan Ulagaththaarudaiya Paavangalai Ennaamal, Kiristhuvukkul Avargalaith Thamakku Oppuravaakki, Oppuravaakkudhalin Ubadhesaththai Engalidaththil Oppuviththaar.

20 aanapadiyinaale, Dhevanaanavar Engalaikkondu Puththisollugiradhupola, Naangal Kiristhuvukkaaga Sthaanaapadhigalaayirundhu, Dhevanode Oppuravaagungal Endru, Kiristhuvinimiththam Ungalai Vendikkollugirom.
21 naam Avarukkul Dhevanudaiya Needhiyaagumpadikku, Paavam Ariyaadha Avarai Namakkaagap Paavamaakkinaar.
